text: @realDonaldTrump You realize the TX Supreme Court decision to deny mail-in votes due to public coronavirus comcerns was conducted remotely, right? Because of the coronavirus risk...? Oh, the grotesque irony. PS: not fooling anybody. TX is gonna vote like crazy. #VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare
